    • Constructor Detail

      • Quest

        public Quest(java.lang.String questTitle,
             java.lang.String objectiveDescription,
             java.lang.Integer goldReward,
             int minimumLevel,
             int objective,
             int experienceGained)
        Constructor of Quest Class. This is the constructor of the Quest class. It set's all atributes and initializes the quest as incomplete.
        Parameters:
        questTitle - Description of a quest.
        objectiveDescription - Description of the objective.
        goldReward - Gold rewarded when completing the quest.
        minimumLevel - Minimum level required to pick this quest.
        objective - Actual objective.
        experienceGained - Experience gained when completing this quest.
